name: Peppered
description:
Peppered is a real-time strategy game about snowball fights!

You command a group of friends in snowball fights against kids around the neighborhood.
Make them scoop up snow, let them throw snowball at opponents and build snow walls to defend yourself.

Features
  • ~30min playtime
  • 4 challengers



Each time a kid gets hit they will become colder and colder. If they become too cold they'll run home crying.
However, each side has a campfire where they can warm-up and "recover".
Extinguishing the opponent's campfire first can pay-off later!
